text: @GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump Oh Ronna, you're not good at this, are you? Numbers are up because people went back to work at their old jobs, mostly because cities opened up that shouldn't have.  With Covid19 spiking all over those jobs numbers will plummet  when we have to shut down AGAIN. Try to keep up.
